All Classes

Class Description
AccountSettingsController
AccountSettingsController controls the AccountSettingsFrame, managing operations like gathering the data for display, changing the data and updating the display.
AccountSettingsFrame
AccountSettingsFrame displays the account information of the user and allows changing the data.
AlreadyMemberException
AlreadyMemberException is thrown when a request is sent for a user to join a team, but the user is already the member of the team.
CloseableComponent
CloseableComponent is an interface for all Components which are not Frames but are closed when their parent frame is closed.
CloseablePropertyChangeListener
CloseablePropertyChangeListener is an extension of PropertyChangeListener, intended to solve the problem of memory leaks caused by the listeners: if a listener is registered for an observable, as long as it is not unregistered, the garbage collector will not collect it due to the remaining reference to it in the PropertyChangeObservable's listener list.
Comment
Represents a Comment belonging to a project and holds its data.
Comment.SavableComment
This class is used only when the comment instance is created to be saved in the database, but does not have a valid id yet.
CommentManager
CommentManager is responsible for executing all the commands needed for the application that are related to comments.
CommentRepository
CommentRepository specifies the methods required from any class implementing database access for comment-related insertions, deletions and queries.
CreateProjectController
CreateProjectController manages the CreateProjectFrame, and it is responsible for updating the corresponding frame when a change in the user input occurs, to interact with the user.
CreateProjectFrame
The CreateProjectFrame allows the user to create a new project, introducing all the required data, such as the title of the project, the deadline of turning in the specific project and the assignee to whom the project is intended.
CreateTeamController
Controller for CreateTeamFrame instances.
CreateTeamFrame
CreateTeamFrame is a frame used for team creation.
DuplicateProjectNameException
DuplicateProjectNameException is thrown when someone tries to create a project inside a team where a project with the same name already exists.
DuplicateUsernameException
DuplicateUsernameException is thrown when a user attempts to sign-in with an already existing username in the database.
EmptyFieldsException
EmptyFieldsException is thrown when a user didn't fill in all the required fields when attempting to perform an operation with user interaction.
ErrorDialogFactory
Utility class which handles frequent exception types on the front-end, by displaying a corresponding dialog message to the user.
FrameController
FrameController defines a generic contract for all the controllers of frames.
IllegalMemberRemovalException
IllegalMemberRemovalException is thrown when the user attempts to remove a member from a team, while that member still has unfinished projects, either assigned to or supervised by them.
IllegalProjectStatusChangeException
IllegalProjectStatusChange is thrown when someone tries to change a project's status but the change is illegal.
InexistentDatabaseEntityException
Exception used when a savable object's id is accessed.
InexistentProjectException
IllegalProjectStatusChange is thrown when a project needed in an operation is not found in the database.
InexistentTeamException
Exception thrown is the team with the specified id or code does not exist in the database.
InexistentUserException
InexistentUserException is thrown when a user with a name/id is requested who does not exist in the database.
InvalidDeadlineException
InvalidDeadlineException is thrown when the user attempts to set the deadline or the turn in date of a project to a date before the current date, which means it is already outdated.
JoinTeamController
Controller for CreateTeamFrame instances.
JoinTeamFrame
JoinTeamFrame is a frame used for team creation.
Main  
MainFrame
This is the main frame of the application, which provides access to the main menu and displays the icons of all the user's teams.
MainMenu
The MainMenu is the menu of the MainFrame, which provides access to the main functionalities of the application: logging out (logoutItem), setting the personal data (accountSettingsItem), creating a new team (createTeamItem) and joining an existing team (joinTeamItem), also viewing the list of projects of the user (viewProjectsItem) and creating a new project (newProjectItem).
MainMenuController
The MainMenuController controls the actions linked to the items in the MainMenu.
Manager
Manager is a helper class for UserManager, TeamManager and ProjectManager.
ManagerRemovalException
Exception thrown when the manager is to be removed from a team.
ModifiedFlowLayout
A modified version of FlowLayout that allows containers using this Layout to behave in a reasonable manner when placed inside a JScrollPane
NoSignedInUserException
NoSignedInUserException is thrown when someone tres to access a functionality accessible to signed-in users only.
Project
Represents a Project and holds its data.
Project.DeadlineStatus
DeadlineStatus is used for database queries and specifies the required status of the project with respect to its deadline.
Project.Importance  
Project.Importance.ImportanceComparator  
Project.SavableProject
This class is used only when the project instance is created to be saved in the database, but does not have a valid id yet.
Project.SorterType
PorjectSorter is used for the database and specifies by which attribute the projects must be sorted when returned from the database.
Project.Status  
ProjectCommentController
The ProjectCommentController manages the ProjectCommentPanel, displaying and updating the list of comments.
ProjectCommentPanel
The ProjectCommentPanel allows the user to view the comments added to the given project and leave their own comments.
ProjectController
The ProjectController manages the ProjectFrame, which allows the user to view the details about the project, mark their contribution and leave comments, and it is responsible for redirecting the user to the parentFrame upon closing the ProjectFrame.
ProjectDetailsController
ProjectDetailsController manages the ProjectDetails panel, being responsible for listing and updating the currently viewed project's details.
ProjectDetailsPanel
ProjectDetailsPanel allows the user to view the details about a given project, such as the title, description, deadline, assignee and supervisor.
ProjectDetailsPanel.DateLabelFormatter  
ProjectFilterController
ProjectFilterController controls the ProjectFilterPanel containing the filters applied to the projects that are displayed.
ProjectFilterController.PrivilegeTypes  
ProjectFilterPanel
The ProjectsFilterPanel contains the filters that can be applied to listing the projects, including the status of the project, the due time for finishing the project, and whether it is a project assigned to/supervised by the current user/a member.
ProjectFrame
The ProjectFrame displays the details about the project, and allows the user to change the status of the project and to leave comments in the comment section.
ProjectListModel
ProjectListMode represents the underlying model containing the list of projects to be displayed.
ProjectManager
ProjectManager is responsible for executing all the commands needed for the application that are related to projects.
ProjectManager.ProjectChangeablePropertyName  
ProjectRepository
ProjectRepository specifies the methods required from any class implementing database access for project-related updates, insertions, deletions and queries.
ProjectsPanel
ProjectsPanel displays the list of projects, which can be sorted based on the deadline or filtered based on the project's status, turn-in time, assignee or supervisor.
ProjectStatusButtonsPanel
Creates a panel containing all the buttons required for changing the status of a project.
ProjectStatusButtonsPanel.ButtonType
The controller specified using the enum the set of necessary buttons.
ProjectStatusController
ProjectStatusController handles all the events related to the status change of the project, including handling the clicks on any of the related buttons, and updateing the ui if the status of the project has changed.
ProjectTable
ProjectTable displays the list of projects which belong to a certain team or which are related to a certain user.
ProjectTableController
ProjectTableController manages the project table, and it is responsible for displaying and updating the projects in the table, with the list of projects received from the ProjectListModel.
PropertyChangeObservable
This interface creates a contract for all classes which can have PropertyChangeListeners and fire PropertyChangeEvents.
SignInController
Controller for managing the SignInFrame.
SignInFrame
SignInFrame allows the user to sign in to the application.
SignUpController
Controller for managing the SignUpFrame.
SignUpFrame
SignUpFrame allows the user to create an account in the application.
SqliteCommentRepository
SqliteCommentRepository is an implementation of CommentRepository which provides database access to an sqlite database holding comment-related data.
SqliteDatabaseConnectionFactory
SqliteDatabaseConnectionFactory is responsible for creating exactly one instance of database connection (remark thhe singleton pattern), used in all repositories.
SqliteProjectRepository
SqliteTeamRepository is an implementation of ProjectRepository which provides database access to an sqlite database holding project-related data.
SqliteTeamRepository
SqliteTeamRepository is an implementation of TeamRepository which provides database access to an sqlite database holding team-related data.
SqliteUserRepository  
Team
This represents a Team and holds data related to its members, projects and other components.
Team.SavableTeam
This class is used only when the team instance is created to be saved in the database, but does not have a valid id yet.
TeamController
The TeamController manages the TeamFrame.
TeamFrame
The TeamFrame allows the user to view the team's details, the members list and the projects in separate tabs.
TeamHomePanel
The TeamHomePanel displays general information about a team.
TeamLabel
TeamLabel is a label representing the most important information of a team, as displayed in the TeamListPanel.
TeamLabelController
Controller for a TeamLabel, which is displayed in the MainFrame.
TeamListController
TeamListController controls the actions related to TeamListPanel.
TeamListPanel
TeamListPanel is a panel which displays a label (icon) for each team in which the currently logged in user is a member.
TeamManager
TeamManager is responsible for executing all the commands needed for the application that are related to teams.
TeamManager.ChangablePropertyName  
TeamMembersController
The TeamMembersController manages the TeamMembersPanel tab, displaying and updating the list of members of a team.
TeamMembersPanel
The TeamMembersPanel displays the list of members of a team.
TeamRepository
TeamRepository specifies the methods required from any class implementing database access for team-related updates, insertions, deletions and queries.
TeamSettingsController
This controller manages the TeamHomePanel, and it is responsible for displaying and updating the currently viewed team's data.
TeamViewModel
TeamViewModel holds the data required for the View (TeamListPanel) to display an icon for a team.
UIFactory
UIFactory provides utility functions for creating generic UI components anywhere in the application, with the predefined attributes.
UnauthorisedOperationException
Exception thrown if the user with @param userId is not authorised to perform @param operation for @param reason.
UnregisteredMemberRemovalException
UnregisteredMemberRemoval is thrown when a request is sent to remove a user from the members of a team, but the user is not a member of the team.
UnregisteredMemberRoleException
UnregisteredMemberRoleException is thrown if a role in a project/team is assigned to a user who is not a member of the team/the team in which the project exists.
User
Represents a User and contains its account information.
User.SavableUser
This class is used only when the user instance is created to be saved in the database, but does not have a valid id yet.
UserManager
Singleton class UserManager.
UserProjectsController
The UserProjectsController manages the UserProjectsFrame, and it is responsible for redirecting the user to the MainFrame upon closing the UserProjectsFrame.
UserProjectsFrame
The UserProjectsFrame allows the user to view all the projects that are either assigned to them, or supervised by them, independent of to which team they belong.
UserRepository
Interface to manage the user data in the database.
